name: Monster Grind (SilenceGameDev, stencil chris)
description:
It is recommended to download the Windows build below for the best experience

Monster Grind is an action-packed monster-catching game created in just 1 week for the DevExp Game Jam 2021!

Help Professor Oexist research strange creatures known as Manimals by capturing as many as you can within the time limit. Discover and catch Manimals in the forest, mountains, desert, and even in the sky. Use traps and nets to secure the capture!

Connect with your Challonge account to participate in the leaderboards and see if you are the master Manimal catcher!

Check your standing on the leaderboard here! Can you beat the current high score?  https://challonge.com/MonsterGrind

Check out the Monster Grind Leaderboard!

Controls (Keyboard)

  • WASD - Move
  • E - Throw Net
  • Q - Place a Stun Trap
  • Left Click - Swing Net
  • F - Toggle Flight Mode
  • *Gamepad controls are also supported!*

Created for the DevExp Game Jam 2021!

  • Producer and Music Design - @DadHatTony
  • Music Design - @spazzmodius_
  • Concept art and Illustrations - Harrison Trinh
  • 3D modeling design and textures - Misha Samorodin
  • Game Development - SilenceGameDev and stencil-chris
